title: blucepheus

content: --- SOLD ---  Incredible lot of peeled brass and silver Casascius with the holo still attached, increasing the desirability of the coins.(4) Ungraded brass (2011 x2, 2013 x2) -- $400/ea(5) Graded brass (2013 x5, ICG MS 63-64) -- $500/ea $450/EA!(1) Ungraded silver (2013) -- $750Ungraded coins will come in an Airtite. DM for one or all. 10% discount for the entire lot. Shipping included in the U.S.
